items.degree: Professional High School in Business Administration

items.details: Active member of Fellowship of the Game (FoG), an academic extension group focused on research and development of digital games.
Strong interest in formal languages and automata theory, continuously seeking to deepen knowledge.
Interest in web application development, staying updated on frameworks, libraries, and innovations.
Deep interest in the field of computer vision and its transformative impact on society.

details: Providing technical support, solving user problems on the run.codes programming exercise platform.
Implementing support for new programming languages according to student and faculty demands.
Contributing to system maintenance and updates.
Using technologies such as Ansible, Docker, SSH, Python, Bash, and PHP, gaining experience in Linux server administration.
Managing physical and digital document archiving.
Assisting with administrative routines, including document organization, photocopying, and sending correspondence.
Coordinating the requisition and replenishment of office supplies based on company needs.
Preparing and digitizing documents, reports, and spreadsheets.
Acted as a monitor representing the Computer Science course (ICMC-USP) at the annual event for prospective students.
Provided information about academic life and course details to high school and pre-university students.
Participates in the socioeconomic selection process for student housing vacancies.
Involved in establishing and disseminating registration dates, procedures, and evaluation criteria.
Assists in conducting interviews and disseminating selection results.
